title: Land with old house
details:
Rs 7 Million Per Perch

31 Perches (Approximately 8 Perches will go for Street Line

4,000 Sq Ft

Old house which was built about 45 Years ago. 4 Bedrooms/2 Bathrooms. Selling for land value only

Nice square block with nice landscaping. Lot of green, trees, and colourful flowers throughout the property

Can park over 10 vehicles

Servants Toilet

Dual entry from Kavinda Place and Masjid Road
